content: Now that you've beaten two of the Five Element Carts, return to the Camp of Seasons Keeper's Shrine and revisit the Pale-Axe Stalwart. Exhaust all dialogue again, where he'll tell you that the carts belong to the Red Boy, and then jump back to the Valley Entrance Keeper's Shrine to continue your exploration.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection 'Return to the Pale-Axe Stalwart'.
The content is as follows:
Now that you've beaten two of the Five Element Carts, return to the Camp of Seasons Keeper's Shrine and revisit the Pale-Axe Stalwart. Exhaust all dialogue again, where he'll tell you that the carts belong to the Red Boy, and then jump back to the Valley Entrance Keeper's Shrine to continue your exploration.
